scripts.build: bun run --filter '@bao/server' build && bun run --filter '@bao/client' build
scripts.typecheck: bun run --filter '@bao/server' build:types && bun run --filter '@bao/shared' typecheck && bun run --filter '@bao/server' typecheck && bun run --filter '@bao/client' typecheck
scripts.test: bun run --filter '@bao/server' test && bun run --filter '@bao/client' test
scripts.lint: bun --bun run biome lint . && bun run --filter '@bao/client' lint
scripts.lint:fix: bun --bun run biome lint . --write && bun run --filter '@bao/client' lint --fix
